title: President releases water to fill Hambantota Port basin
content: President Mahinda Rajapaksa ceremonially released water to the 17 meter deep inland Hambantota harbour basin this morning amidst chanting of Sethpirith by Maha Sanga. Prime Minister, Cabinet Ministers, Members of Parliament, Provincial Councils and Pradeshiya Sabhas were present. A large crowd was present in the Port basin to witness this historic moment. Once port construction…
